data.message:
Hello Facebook. My name is Branimir. Several days ago i send a request for a verified badge but you refused me a million times! I believe that my site meets all the requirements for verification! Tell me what you need from my data! (MY ID) I do not know! I think you have a mistake in the system because I'm confused! Soon I'm going to X Factor and I need a verified site! Down below I'll send you all my details and please answer me! Thank you!
Branimir Stamenić P.S please visit inbox i send my ID 
MY FACEBOOK PAGE: https://www.facebook.com/BranimirOfficial

replies.message: Thanks for your question, Branimir. You can learn more about how to request Page verification athttps://www.facebook.com/help/100168986860974. -Sarah

Thanks for your answer but I compete in a tv show The X Factor and I would like  to accept my request... I do not want to say for myself that I am a public figure but  almost .... I believe that my site meets all the requirements for verification!  Please if you want help me :D Thank you again!!! Big hug <3
